 DGU is a 3rd person 3D adventure/puzzle game where the player plays as
 a student of the Death God University studying to become a death god
 assistant. 
 Set in a wacky world, DGU takes its inspiration in the old point and 
 click adventure / puzzle games like Day of the Tentacle or Sam & Max
 or Monkey Island. 
 In order to get graduated and pass to the next class, the player 
 needs to kill collect souls of targets assigned to him by his teachers.
 To do this, the player needs to gather items and craft deadly traps,
 decoy devices and/or use the environment to his advantage! 
 There is only one rule! It must look like an accident.

   1. Extract release
   2. Mount ISO
   3. Install the game
   4. Copy crack from the folder /PLAZA
   5. Play
   
   PROPER notes: FLT's release was not working due to the broken build 
   published by devs, it constantly crashed.
   This is a completely new build and has been tested to work fine.
